analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule allows any Administration to replace the professional and non-partisan objective policy experts who serve the nation across Administrations with partisan hacks. This will cause great harm to the nation.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service and the importance of maintaining a merit-based system. It references historical examples to argue against the dangers of a politicized civil service, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
